function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of chlorine in wastewater treatment system","Impact":"Exposure to high levels of chlorine can cause health issues and respiratory problems","Mitigation":"Use alternative disinfection methods such as UV or ozone treatment","Technologies":"UV or ozone treatment systems","People":"Hospital staff, workers, and nearby residents","Owner":"Hospital management, wastewater treatment system operators"},{"Description":"Improper handling of chlorine disinfection equipment","Impact":"Accidental exposure to or release of chlorine can cause harm to individuals and the environment","Mitigation":"Provide proper training for handling chlorine equipment and implement emergency response protocols","Technologies":"Emergency response systems, safety training programs","People":"Wastewater treatment system operators, maintenance staff","Owner":"Wastewater treatment system management"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring of chlorine levels in wastewater","Impact":"Inaccurate chlorine dosage can lead to ineffective disinfection or overexposure to chlorine","Mitigation":"Implement regular monitoring and calibration of chlorine dosage equipment","Technologies":"Chlorine level monitoring systems, calibration tools","People":"Wastewater treatment operators, environmental health officials","Owner":"Wastewater treatment system management"}]}
